name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Backend Developer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **PHP**, building robust **APIs**, and managing **Databases** to ensure seamless data integration and retrieval. Skilled in using **Docker** for containerization and deployment, thus enhancing application scalability and maintainability.
Experienced in developing **clean and maintainable code**, with a strong emphasis on **high-performance code** and **end-to-end feature development**. Well-versed in testing and deploying applications, with a focus on effective **monitoring** and ongoing optimization. Excellent **collaboration** and **communication skills**, facilitating teamwork in fast-paced environments.
Additionally, knowledgeable in AI/ML applications using **Python** and **Flutter**, with hands-on experience in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** for full-stack development. Familiar with **AWS** and **Azure** cloud services, as well as implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines, ensuring compliance across industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
